櫎字的基本解释

櫎
huǎng
搁置物品的器具。
放兵器的架子。
帷幔、屏风一类的东西：“犹悬北窗櫎，未卷南轩帷。”

櫎
guǒ
　ㄍㄨㄛˇ
长。

櫎
gǔ
　ㄍㄨˇ
方言，估计。

櫎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huǎng］
［《廣韻》胡廣切，上蕩，匣。］
(1)帷幔之类。
(2)借指窗。
[②]［guàng］
［《集韻》古曠切，去宕，見。］
(1)古代经济学用词。指平准价格。
(2)指计算价钱。

櫎字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫎； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页559第31
【唐韻】胡廣切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】戸廣切，?音晃。【說文】所以支器。一曰帷櫎，屛風之屬，與榥同。【左思·吳都賦】房櫳對櫎。【李善註】櫎，門窻廡之通名。【徐鉉曰】別作幌，非是。　又【廣韻】兵欄也。　又【集韻】古曠切，音廣。俎跗橫木。　又【類篇】光鑊切，音郭。義同。　又【韻會】亦與橫同。

櫎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
櫎字的起名意思

暂无。

櫎
Basic explanation of words
櫎
huǎng
An appliance for shelving items.
Shelves for placing weapons.
Curtains, screens and other things: "It still hangs on the north window, but has not rolled the Nanxuan curtain."
櫎
guǒ
ㄍ ㄨ ㄛˇ
long.
櫎
gǔ
ㄍ ㄨˇ
Dialect, estimate.
櫎
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huǎng］
["Guangyun" Hu Guangqie, Shangdang, Xie. ]
(1) Curtains and the like.
(2) By means of the window.
[②]［guàng］
["Ji Yun" Gu Kuang cut, go to Dang, see you. ]
(1) Ancient economics terms. Refers to the leveled price.
(2) Refers to calculating the price.
櫎
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　櫎; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 559 31
[Tang Yun] Hu Guangqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] To Guangqie,? Yin Huang. [Said the text] So the support device. One said that the drapery, the genus of the wind, is the same as the last. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Fang Zhi is opposite. [Li Shan's Note] 櫎, the general name of the door 窻庑. [Xu Xuan said] Don’t pretend, it’s true.　[Guangyun] Binglan also.　[Jiyun] Ancient Kuang cut, wide sound. Cuo Hengmu.　[Classes] Light Wok Cut, Yin Guo. The same meaning.　[Rhyme Club] is also the same as Heng.

櫎
Name meaning
Nothing.
guàng
сущ.
1) створчатая ширма, экран
2) навес (крыши), тент
3) стойка для оружия
